cleaned_text: LLC Vaccines do not cause autism. And they are critical for human health and animal health alike. As someone working in science side of agriculture and also a parent of a child with autism, I am going to offer a firm view. Not only are vaccines safe, they are true scientific innovations in both human health and animal health. And obviously so very true right now when we need vaccine innovations more than ever. I want to go a step further. Foods don't cause autism either. My son eats all kinds of foods and always has-- meats, dairy, vegetables etc... and he gets his nutrition from these foods and is doing great as a result. It bothers me when people act like certain foods cause autism, given both my position as an advocate for agriculture and for my son with autism.
